243256919665714165.Text: Kurapli, an Urshilaku trader, says an outcast ashlander named Zallay Subaddamael betrayed Urshilaku hospitality and killed her husband. Kurapli promised that if I can find Zallay Subaddamael, kill him, and bring her the justice of his death, she will give me as reward her husband's enchanted Spirit Spear.

272022891547414156.Text: Kurapli says the outcast ashlander Zallay Subaddamael may be found in Aharasaplit camp on the island of Sheogorad, the large island north of Vvardenfell. Kurapli says I might find information about Zallay Subaddamael or Aharasaplit camp in the fishing village of Dagon Fel on Sheogorad Island.

25217670118219557.Text: I have given personal vengeance to the Urshilaku trader Kurapli by killing the murderer of her husband, Airan-Ahhe. As a reward, she gave me her husband's enchanted Spirit spear, and has asked only that I remember her husband's name when using it.
